metadata.description: Inventory - The preferred language for the emails sent to the admin email alias, which is specified in theAdmin eMail environment variable. Default is en-US
Inventory - REQUIRED. The maker URL used by PowerApps for your cloud. Ex https://make.powerapps.com/
Inventory - CoE Admin eMail. Email address used in flows to send notifications to admins; this should be either your email address or a distribution list
Inventory - Yes by default. Set to No if you are creating a dev type envt. This will allow some flows to set target users to the admin instead of resource owners
Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/

When_a_row_is_added,_modified_or_deleted.description: Triggers when the request status is updated to Approved

variables.name: varErrorMessage
variables.value: An error occured when provisioning the approved environment.

inputs.name: varErrorMessage
inputs.value: There was an issue creating the environment. Error message: @{body('Create_Environment')?['error']?['message']}

inputs.name: varExpriationEmailCard
inputs.value: ⚠Temporary Environment Clean-Up Warning: To keep the tenant clean, the Environment will be automatically cleaned up on @{body('Calculate_expiration_date')} (@{triggerOutputs()?['body/coe_durationrequested']} days). You will be notified weekly when the Environment is close to being cleaned up. Please make sure to save work that will be needed beyond the expiration date outside of the Environment.

parameters.$select: admin_body, admin_cc, admin_replyto, admin_sendonbehalf, admin_subject, admin_importance

parameters.$filter: admin_basedon eq '@{outputs('emailGUID_to_en-US_3')}' and admin_language eq '@{parameters('Admin eMail Preferred Language (admin_AdmineMailPreferredLanguage)')}'

parameters.$select: admin_body, admin_cc, admin_replyto, admin_sendonbehalf, admin_subject, admin_importance

parameters.$filter: admin_basedon eq '@{outputs('emailGUID_to_en-US_2')}' and admin_language eq '@{parameters('Admin eMail Preferred Language (admin_AdmineMailPreferredLanguage)')}'

parameters.$select: admin_body, admin_cc, admin_replyto, admin_sendonbehalf, admin_subject, admin_importance

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

variables.name: varExpriationEmailCard
variables.value: The Environment does not have any expiration date and can be used indefinitely. If at any point in the future this Environment is no longer needed, help keep costs down by deleting the Environment.

Set_variable_varMakerPortalUrl.description: Updates to the environment variable value, else keeps the default make.powerapps.com

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date

definition.description: When an Environment Creation Request has been Approved, this flow automates the provisioning and sends a confirmation email when successfully completed.
